statusLine.command: input=$(cat); user=$(whoami); hostname=$(hostname -s); pwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_status=''; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ]; then git_status="${branch}*"; else git_status="$branch"; fi; fi; status_parts=(); status_parts+=("$user@$hostname"); status_parts+=("$(basename "$pwd")"); [ -n "$git_status" ] && status_parts+=("$git_status"); status_parts+=("$model"); printf '%s' "$(IFS=' '; echo "${status_parts[*]}")"
